prompts.name: Business Process Analysis
prompts.description: This template facilitates the creation of a thorough business process analysis. Replace {{process identification}} with the business processes that need to be analysed, {{process mapping}} with the visualisation of these processes, {{performance measurement}} with your method of assessing these processes, and {{improvement suggestions}} with recommended adjustments to enhance efficiency.
prompts.content: Sketch a comprehensive business process analysis that includes detailed {{process identification}}, meticulous {{process mapping}}, precise {{performance measurement}}, and actionable {{improvement suggestions}}. Please refrain from disclosing any sensitive information regarding the organisation's proprietary processes.

prompts.name: Data Analysis Report
prompts.description: This layout aids in structuring a cohesive data analysis report. Substitute {{data sources}} with origins of the data under analysis, {{analysis methods}} with tools and techniques applied, {{findings}} with key results or trends from the analysis, and {{recommendations}} with suggestions based on the analysed data.
prompts.content: Develop a robust data analysis report discussing your relevant {{data sources}}, applying your scientific {{analysis methods}}, summarising the critical {{findings}}, and offering strategic {{recommendations}}. Avoid revealing confidential data or proprietary analytical techniques.

prompts.name: Market Research Strategy
prompts.description: This structure enables the development of an effective market research strategy. Replace {{research objectives}} with what you hope to learn, {{research methods}} with techniques used to gather market information, {{target audience}} with the consumer segment to be researched, and {{research analysis}} with your approach to interpreting the results.
prompts.content: Formulate an insightful market research strategy, underscoring your well-defined {{research objectives}}, sustainable {{research methods}}, defined {{target audience}}, and comprehensive {{research analysis}}. Remember not to include confidential customer details or proprietary research methodologies.

prompts.name: Requirement Gathering Approach
prompts.description: This blueprint assists in establishing a systematic requirement gathering approach. Substitute {{stakeholder identification}} with individuals or groups you'll need input from, {{information collection methods}} with techniques for data collection, {{requirement categorisation}} with sorting of needs into groups, and {{requirement validation}} with the process of confirming requirements.
prompts.content: Construct a focused requirement gathering approach, outlining identified {{stakeholder identification}}, effective {{information collection methods}}, logical {{requirement categorisation}}, and meticulous {{requirement validation}}. Avoid disclosing specific stakeholder comments or internal software development requests.

prompts.name: Business Case Development
prompts.description: This template guides in the creation of a compelling business case. Replace {{problem statement}} with the issue the business is facing, {{proposed solution}} with your idea to tackle the problem, {{benefit-cost analysis}} with quantifying the expected benefits versus the cost, and {{risk assessment}} with potential drawbacks and how to deal with them.
prompts.content: Draft a persuasive business case featuring a concise {{problem statement}}, an innovative {{proposed solution}}, a thorough {{benefit-cost analysis}}, and a detailed {{risk assessment}}. Please refrain from revealing sensitive financial data or future business strategy plans.

prompts.name: Project Scoping Document
prompts.description: This template facilitates the development of a detailed project scoping document. Substitute {{project objectives}} with the aims your project intends to achieve, {{scope boundaries}} with clarification of what's included and what's not, {{deliverables}} with the final outcomes expected, and {{constraints}} with any limitations such as time, budget, or resources.
prompts.content: Conceive a precise project scoping document that includes clear {{project objectives}}, defined {{scope boundaries}}, listed {{deliverables}}, and recognised {{constraints}}. Remember to avoid exposing confidential project-related data or proprietary project management strategies.

prompts.name: Competitor Analysis Report
prompts.description: This outline assists in formulating a comprehensive competitor analysis report. Replace {{competitor identification}} with whom you are comparing your business to, {{product comparison}} with the examination of your products or services against those of rivals, {{marketing strategies assessment}} with a review of competitors' promotional techniques, and {{SWOT analysis}} with an analysis of competitors' strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats.
prompts.content: Assemble a thorough competitor analysis report presenting identifiable {{competitor identification}}, fair {{product comparison}}, insightful {{marketing strategies assessment}}, and critical {{SWOT analysis}}. Please avoid sharing confidential marketing strategies or excessive company critique.

prompts.name: User Acceptance Testing (UAT) Plan
prompts.description: This blueprint aids in structuring a User Acceptance Testing Plan. Substitute {{test objectives}} with the goals of your UAT, {{user roles}} with the users set to perform the tests, {{test scenarios}} with situations in which the system will be tested, and {{test evaluation criteria}} with what determines a successful or failed test.
prompts.content: Frame a robust UAT Plan, highlighting purposeful {{test objectives}}, identified {{user roles}}, realistic {{test scenarios}}, and precise {{test evaluation criteria}}. Refrain from specifying sensitive user data or proprietary test scenarios.

prompts.name: Change Management Strategy
prompts.description: This template enables the creation of a successful change management strategy. Replace {{change vision}} with the desired state after the change, {{change drivers}} with factors driving the necessity for change, {{stakeholder engagement plan}} with ways to involve all participants in the process, and {{change tracking mechanism}} with your system to monitor the success of change implementation.
prompts.content: Draft an effective change management strategy detailing your inspired {{change vision}}, recognisable {{change drivers}}, proactive {{stakeholder engagement plan}}, and reliable {{change tracking mechanism}}. Please avoid revealing specific personnel-related change details or confidential organisational plans.

prompts.name: Key Performance Indicator (KPI) Report
prompts.description: This structure guides the assembly of a meaningful KPI Report. Substitute {{KPI identification}} with the chosen business performance metrics, {{measurement methods}} with how you track those KPIs, {{performance insights}} with results of the KPI tracking, and {{recommendations}} with the proposals based on the performance insights.
prompts.content: Craft a comprehensive KPI report featuring your strategic {{KPI identification}}, methodical {{measurement methods}}, insightful {{performance insights}}, and forward-looking {{recommendations}}. Avoid revealing sensitive performance data or internal strategic developments.
